package.name: I18N_ISO_3166
package.description: Provides methods for converting between ISO 3166 two letter, three letter, three number and country names.

release.notes: - removed entry for 'YU' => 'Yugoslavia' + added entry for 'CS' => 'Serbia and Montenegro' + added entry for 'AX' => 'Åland Islands' * All countries now use shortened form of the official name
* East Timor has changed name to Timor-Leste (in november 2002)
* allow lowercase countrycodes to be given as input
